title: F.A. Cup Final 1960
brief_description: The Football Association Challenge Cup Final is one of Britain’s great sporting events of the year. The 1960 Final was played between Blackburn Rovers and Wolverhampton Wanderers. This film attempts to capture the atmosphere of this great event played at Wembley Stadium near London before a crowd of 100,000 spectators.
